trans-unit.source: A Hy kernel for Jupyter based on MetaKernel

Calysto Hy is a Hy kernel for Jupyter based on [Metakernel](https://github.com/Calysto/metakernel). [Hy is a language](https://github.com/hylang/hy) that converts Lisp-like syntax to Python semantics.
trans-unit.target: Calysto Hy是基于[Metakernel]（https://github.com/Calysto/metakernel）的Jupyter的Hy内核。[Hy是一种语言]（https://github.com/hylang/hy），可将类似Lisp的语法转换为Python语义。

trans-unit.source: If installing into the system, you may want to:
trans-unit.target: 如果安装到系统中,你可能要。

trans-unit.source: If you want to enjoy full code completion by [kaschalk/jedhy](https://github.com/ekaschalk/jedhy) you have use bleeding edge and install hy master (> 0.13.1), jedhy and toolz first because jedhy is using new hy syntax. Otherwise calysto_hy falls back to is normal completion.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想享受[kaschalk / jedhy]（https://github.com/ekaschalk/jedhy）的完整代码完成功能，则可以使用出血边缘并首先安装hy master（> 0.13.1），jedhy和toolz，因为jedhy是使用新的hy语法。否则，calysto_hy会恢复到正常完成状态。

trans-unit.source: Or into a virtualenv, when it is already activated:
trans-unit.target: 或者进入virtualenv,当它已经被激活。
或者进入你的个人空间。

trans-unit.source: This kernel is based on [bollwyvl/hy_kernel/](https://github.com/bollwyvl/hy_kernel/) That kernel treats Hy as a Python preprocessor, and can therefore use the standard IPython tools. Calysto Hy treats Hy as a full language. Because of this, it uses the MetaKernel to gain magics, shell, parallel processing, etc.
trans-unit.target: 该内核是基于[bollwyvl / hy_kernel /（https://github.com/bollwyvl/hy_kernel/）即内核对待海兰为Python预处理器，并且因此可以使用标准的IPython的工具。Calysto Hy将Hy视为一种完整的语言。因此，它使用MetaKernel来获得魔法，外壳，并行处理等。

trans-unit.source: You can use Calysto Hy in Jupyter notebook by selecting the “Calysto Hy” kernel. See example [notebooks](https://github.com/Calysto/calysto_hy/tree/master/notebooks).
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过选择“ Calysto Hy”内核在Jupyter笔记本中使用Calysto Hy。参见示例[notebooks]（https://github.com/Calysto/calysto_hy/tree/master/notebooks）。

trans-unit.source: `shell pip3 install git+https://github.com/ekaschalk/jedhy.git pip3 install git+https://github.com/Calysto/calysto_hy.git python3 -m calysto_hy install `
trans-unit.target: `shell pip3安装git + https：//github.com/ekaschalk/jedhy.git pip3安装git + https：//github.com/Calysto/calysto_hy.git python3 -m calysto_hy安装`

trans-unit.source: `shell pip3 install git+https://github.com/ekaschalk/jedhy.git pip3 install git+https://github.com/Calysto/calysto_hy.git python3 -m calysto_hy install --sys-prefix `
trans-unit.target: `shell pip3安装git + https：//github.com/ekaschalk/jedhy.git pip3安装git + https：//github.com/Calysto/calysto_hy.git python3 -m calysto_hy安装--sys-prefix

trans-unit.source: `shell pip3 install git+https://github.com/ekaschalk/jedhy.git--user pip3 install git+https://github.com/Calysto/calysto_hy.git--user python3 -m calysto_hy install --user `
trans-unit.target: `shell pip3 install git + https：//github.com/ekaschalk/jedhy.git--用户pip3安装git + https：//github.com/Calysto/calysto_hy.git--用户python3 -m calysto_hy install --user `

trans-unit.source: `shell sudo pip3 install git+https://github.com/ekaschalk/jedhy.git sudo pip3 install git+https://github.com/Calysto/calysto_hy.git sudo python3 -m calysto_hy install `
trans-unit.target: `shell sudo pip3 install git + https：//github.com/ekaschalk/jedhy.git sudo pip3 install git + https：//github.com/Calysto/calysto_hy.git sudo python3 -m calysto_hy install`
